G3_build_succeeds.notes: npm run build succeeded, including prebuild governance engine step.

G9_chart_renders_data.notes: StrategyMatrixChart.tsx renders a Scatter chart with mapped project data.

G10_tooltips_implemented.notes: Custom Tooltip component implemented in StrategyMatrixChart.tsx:76.

A1_data_population.notes: Exceeds expectations with a rich, realistic dataset spanning all quadrants.

A2_score_normalization.notes: Correct normalization logic implemented in a dedicated governance script.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Well-structured, separated from UI, and handles boundaries correctly.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Correct axes and domain. Lacks in-chart quadrant background labels (score 4 requirement).

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Rich information including Title, Quadrant, ROI, and a direct link to the project detail.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Logic in scripts/governance/ vs UI in src/components/StrategyMatrixChart.tsx
A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Exemplary separation using a build-time master_data.json pipeline.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: Top-tier implementation of the Strategy Matrix with a robust data pipeline and high visual polish.

B1_project_setup.evidence: .gitignore only contains 'node_modules'; .next and out are committed.
B1_project_setup.notes: Significant project hygiene issue: committing 200MB of build artifacts and cache.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Complete route structure matching PRD with consistent, config-driven navigation.

B3_type_safety.notes: Strong typing with Zod validation at build time, though scripts are plain JS.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Strong technical architecture and routing, marred by poor project hygiene regarding build artifacts.

C1_visual_design.evidence: globals.css custom properties and cohesive component design.
C1_visual_design.notes: Premium visual design with cohesive branding and professional spacing.

C2_responsive_design.notes: Solid responsive implementation for most views.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.evidence: Skeleton.tsx and context-aware empty state messages.
C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Excellent coverage of non-happy-path states with skeleton loaders.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Branding integrated via CSS variables, though fallbacks are heavily used.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: Visually polished application with excellent consideration for loading and empty states.

D1_schema_adherence.notes: Strict Zod validation matches PRD 3.2 schema exactly.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Exact match to PRD quadrant boundaries and labels.

D3_route_structure.notes: All primary and secondary routes implemented, including project details.

D4_specification_details.notes: Follows most details; minor gaps in fiscal week logic.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Very high fidelity to the PRD specifications.

E1_separation_of_concerns.evidence: Architecture split across scripts, components, and app.
E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Solid separation; minor utility duplication (formatCurrency) across files.

E3_error_handling.notes: Strong build-time validation; runtime error boundaries are missing.

E4_dependency_choices.notes: Expert-level choices aligned with PRD (Recharts, Fuse.js, Zod).

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Clean, maintainable code with professional architectural patterns.

F1_dashboard.notes: Full dashboard matching PRD widgets and calculations.

F2_additional_pages.evidence: Roadmap, Updates, and Project Details implemented.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Advanced fuzzy search and keyboard shortcuts matching PRD spec.

F4_creative_additions.notes: The AI ingestion engine is an exceptional and technically impressive addition.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Outstanding bonus feature delivery, specifically the AI ingestion pipeline.

G1_prioritization.notes: Strategically built a complete product by prioritizing high-impact systems.

G2_pr_description.notes: Brief but useful documentation; lacks the required PR summary format.

H2_message_quality.notes: Useful but could be more specific.

top_strengths: Exceptional AI Ingestion Pipeline implementation demonstrating deep technical skill.
Robust build-time Governance Engine with strict Zod validation.
Highly polished UI/UX with professional features like Cmd+K search and skeleton loaders.
Comprehensive dataset generation (11 projects) providing a complete product feel.
top_weaknesses: Poor project hygiene: committed build artifacts and cache (.next, out) without a proper .gitignore.
Lack of runtime Error Boundaries in the React application.
standout_moments: The AI Ingestion Pipeline is an outstanding addition that perfectly executes the PRD's advanced vision for project draft generation.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This is a top-tier candidate with exceptional architectural thinking and full-stack execution. They prioritize building scalable systems and polished products. They are a strong hire for roles requiring technical leadership and product awareness.
